author: tellison
msg: Make test more robust by ensuring all bytes are read from input stream, not just those that are immediately available.
Let any IOException percolate up to test framework for handling.

author: antelder
msg: Start of some itest around nodes and domains. Can be merged with the other nodes itests but for now do it separately

author: tabish
msg: Fix the test case such that a TextMessage is sent using a CompressionPolicy that yeilds no compression.  Sending a TextMessage in compressed form using .NET compression results in the broker rejecting the message because it can't read the contained string.  This at least provides a test for the use of a custom compression policy.

author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Carsten Schinzer " Extend ContentOperationData for LEGAL_INFO." (https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-3234) - OFBIZ-3234
I found that among the typical company / ecommerce content, there is also legal information such as: Terms and Conditions, Imprint / Legal Notices, Data Protection Policies, other policies.
